scripts.clean: rm -rf _site/; rm -rf assets/img/releases/small/; rm -rf assets/img/releases/small-retina/; rm -rf assets/img/releases/medium/; rm -rf assets/img/releases/medium-retina/; rm -rf assets/img/releases/og-images/; rm -rf assets/img/artists/small/; rm -rf assets/img/artists/small-retina/; rm -rf assets/img/artists/medium/; rm -rf assets/img/artists/medium-retina/; rm -rf assets/img/artists/og-images/; rm -rf assets/img/releases/micro/; rm -rf assets/img/artists/micro/
scripts.dev: npm run clean; gulp img:resize; gulp watch
